thread.title_full: THE WEST ZONE message board | SHOP NOW: DEALS on CLEMSON app

author: rivals.com
title: THE WEST ZONE message board | SHOP NOW: DEALS on CLEMSON app
text:
When Clemson kicks off spring practice March 1, the spotlight will predictably fall on who emerges as the heir to star quarterback Deshaun Watson .
With respect to other scholarship players who will be on the roster, we believe there to be three viable candidates: rising junior Kelly Bryant , redshirted freshman Zerrick Cooper and freshman early enrollee Hunter Johnson .
In the first of a three-part series, we assess the reasons why each candidate could or should win the job.
Here is the case for Cooper as Clemsonâ€™s next quarterback:
Former four-star recruit Zerrick Cooper will have no shortage of opportunities to make a big splash at quarterback this off-season. Tigerillustrated.com
